recipe_name: Stewed plums with sweet goats' cheese cream
author: James Martin
method: For the stewed plums, place all of the ingredients into a saucepan, bring to the boil and simmer for 6-7 minutes, or until the plums are tender. Remove the plums from the liquid using a slotted spoon and transfer to a bowl. For the sweet goats' cheese cream, place all of the ingredients into a bowl and mix well to combine. To serve, spoon some of the goats' cheese cream over the plums in the bowl.
ingredients: 2 plums, stones removed, halved ,  ½ bottle red wine,  1 orange, juice and zest,  100g/3½oz caster sugar,  1 tsp mixed spice,  1 tsp cloves,  50g/1½oz goats' cheese,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  50ml/2fl oz runny honey
